channel.title: Corrupted Laptop
channel.description:
Well I got a new gaming laptop and have had some problems with it. It keeps telling me I have a lot of corrupted files, I can't open firefox because it is corrupted, I can't use imageshack anymore since it is corrupted, it says IE is also corrupted. Uninstalling and reinstalling does not help. I don't know what to do so I am posting here to see if I can get this fixed before it gets worse. I scanned for viruses and have none. Other than corruption, I am unable to model in Cinema 4d as when I move everything lags and the image in my viewport splits till I stop moving, and in Maya if I choose say the move tool in the perspective view, I can only use it in that view till I re open it and choose it in another view. This is making modeling very hard and rather not enjoyable.
My Laptop specs:
Model: ASUS notebook G50VT series. Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo CPU P7450 @ 2.13 GHz Memory (RAM): 4.00 GB System type: 64 bit Operating System

I’ve had that happen to me before on Vista. Format, install XP. or 7
[/quote][/quote]

item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Your problem is you’re gaming on a laptop AND you didn’t make a clean installation of I’m guessing Windows over the factory default.

Read full topic

item.title: Corrupted Laptop
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

Well I got a new gaming laptop and have had some problems with it. It keeps telling me I have a lot of corrupted files, I can’t open firefox because it is corrupted, I can’t use imageshack anymore since it is corrupted, it says IE is also corrupted. Uninstalling and reinstalling does not help. I don’t know what to do so I am posting here to see if I can get this fixed before it gets worse. I scanned for viruses and have none. Other than corruption, I am unable to model in Cinema 4d as when I move everything lags and the image in my viewport splits till I stop moving, and in Maya if I choose say the move tool in the perspective view, I can only use it in that view till I re open it and choose it in another view. This is making modeling very hard and rather not enjoyable.

My Laptop specs:

Model: ASUS notebook G50VT series.
Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo CPU P7450 @ 2.13 GHz
Memory (RAM): 4.00 GB
System type: 64 bit Operating System
